name: GameLiftFleetEC2InboundPermission
description: EC2InboundPermission is a property of the AWS::GameLift::Fleet resource that specifies the traffic that is permitted to access your game servers in an Amazon GameLift (GameLift) fleet.

properties.name: FromPort
properties.description: The starting value for a range of allowed port numbers. This value must be lower than the ToPort value.

properties.name: IpRange
properties.description: The range of allowed IP addresses in CIDR notation.

properties.name: Protocol
properties.description: The network communication protocol that is used by the fleet. For valid values, see the IpPermission data type in the Amazon GameLift API Reference.

properties.name: ToPort
properties.description: The ending value for a range of allowed port numbers. This value must be higher than the FromPort value.
